description: A Operating System simulator developed as part of the CMSC 312. This program simulates a computer with two cores each having their own long term and short term scheduler to simulate context switch and proper process management. The program also implements a basic paging system for memory management and handles page faults and swapping.
accomplishments: Implement a Operating System simulator that simulates process management, memory management, and multi core / thread processing
Implement a multi level short term scheduler for two cores
Implement a basic UI that shows the current status of the simulator
